p: Forty‐four dogs treated with 0.5‐0.7 mg/M 2 intravenous vincristine were included in the study, all of the dogs had lymphoma. Boxers (4), Labradors (4) and Spaniels (6), were over‐represented. The study population had a mean age of 7.8 years, ranging from 2.7‐13 years. Mean body weight was 22.9 kgs ranging from 3.4‐63kgs.
